Test Case Details: Validate homepage elements for guest user
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Verify welcome heading
3. Verify Shop Now button
4. Verify Why Choose Us section
5. Verify Shop by Category section
Expected Results: All homepage elements should be visible

Test Case Details: Validate navbar elements for guest user
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Check for Login link
3. Check for Register link
4. Verify Home; Products; Cart; Orders links visible
Expected Results: Should show Login/Register options; no Profile or Logout

Test Case Details: Test Shop Now button navigation
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Click Shop Now button
3. Verify navigation to products page
Expected Results: Should navigate to products page

Test Case Details: Validate Why Choose Us section content
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Verify Why Choose Us heading
3. Verify Quality Products card
4. Verify Fast Delivery card
5. Verify 24/7 Support card
Expected Results: All three feature cards should be visible

Test Case Details: Validate Shop by Category displays categories
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Count category cards displayed
3. Verify at least one category is shown
Expected Results: Should display multiple category cards

Test Case Details: Test category card click navigation
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Click on Electronics category
3. Verify URL contains category parameter
Expected Results: Should navigate to products page with category=Electronics

Test Case Details: Test Cart link for guest user shows alert
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Click on Cart link
3. Wait for alert
Expected Results: Should show 'Please login to continue' alert

Test Case Details: Test Orders link for guest user shows alert
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Click on Orders link
3. Wait for alert
Expected Results: Should show 'Please login to continue' alert

Test Case Details: Validate footer is visible on homepage
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /
2. Scroll to bottom
3. Verify footer is visible
Expected Results: Footer should be visible with copyright text

Test Case Details: Test logo click returns to homepage
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Click on logo
3. Verify navigation to homepage
Expected Results: Should navigate back to homepage

Test Case Details: Validate navbar for logged in normal user
Pre-Condition: User logged in as normal user
Test Steps:
1. Login as normal user
2. Navigate to /
3. Check for Profile; Wishlist; Notifications; Logout
4. Verify Login/Register not visible
Expected Results: Should show Profile; Wishlist; Notifications; Logout; no Login/Register

Test Case Details: Test Shop Now for logged in user
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Navigate to /
3. Click Shop Now
4. Verify navigation
Expected Results: Should navigate to products page

Test Case Details: Test Cart link for logged in user
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Navigate to /
3. Click Cart link
4. Verify navigation
Expected Results: Should access cart page without alert

Test Case Details: Test Orders link for logged in user
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Navigate to /
3. Click Orders link
4. Verify navigation
Expected Results: Should access orders page without alert

Test Case Details: Test Notifications link accessibility

Test Case Details: Test logout removes session
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Navigate to /
3. Click Logout button
4. Verify navbar changes to guest view
Expected Results: Should show Login/Register links; remove Profile/Logout

Test Case Details: Validate normal user cannot see Admin link
Pre-Condition: User logged in as normal user
Test Steps:
1. Login as normal user
2. Navigate to /
3. Check for Admin link visibility
Expected Results: Admin link should not be visible

2. Navigate to /
3. Check for Admin; Profile; Logout links
Expected Results: Should show Admin; Profile; Logout links
